page.title: 19USES OF OULTON BROAD
page.content:
The broads is a very nice place where quite a lot of people live.It is used for leisure.In summer a lot of holiday makers come to Oulton Broad.The holiday makers go out on pleasure cruisers for the week.Every Thursday on Oulton Broad from May to September there is powerboat racing.Lots of crowds come down to watch powerboat racing.It is a very exciting sport.Oulton Broad is a very good fishing spot. You can catch fish like Tench, Carp, Pike, Roach, Eel, Perch, Dace and many more.Some people go fresh water fishing a lot so they know some good spots like Night Creek and Horseshoe Point.
}
